info.name: Matt Evans
info.title: Developer & Graphic Designer
info.summary: Front-End Developer with PHP and Full-Stack experience, coming from a graphic design background and with professional experience in both customer-service and technical roles. Highly adaptable, quick to learn, and able to juggle multiple tasks. A versatile creative with skills working as part of a team or individually on projects.

experience.title: Front-end Developer/Graphic Designer
experience.bio:
Role:
Responsible for general upkeep and improvement of existing products, while designing
and developing new projects at the request of the directors. Also responsible for all
graphic design aspects and needs of the group at an ad hoc basis.
UKDS is part of a group of companies, and is responsible for the technical requirements
of all other companies within the group. Group includes solicitors, accountants, datarecovery specialist, and social media management.
Projects:
- Vue Application: Developed new Vue.js/Laravel 7 applications for new arm of existing
business. Project included building two separate Vue.js applications, one using a
Nuxt.js server and the other on a LAMP-Stack, which interacted with a custom Laravel
7 API server. Also involved utilising Progressive Web Application (PWA) technology,
developing with third-party APIs, and implementing CircleCI deployment.
- WordPress Blog: Setup new WordPress blog site for local political entity. Involved
complete design and several minor custom elements. Project received with tight
deadline, and completed within two weeks.
- Multi-lingual Information Site: Created a single Laravel 6 site that could be deployed
to separate servers, each of which hosted a diﬀerent language-based environment
in diﬀerent countries. Project included full graphical design, language translation
implementation and Ansible script deployment.
- Existing Site Rebuild/Redesign: Updated existing site to use Laravel 5 over previous
Symphony build, along with new design. Implemented CMS-style application structure
to allow simple content updates and integrated blog.
- Data Recovery Partner Portal: Created and deployed LAMP-Stack Laravel 5 web
portal for potential shop-partners to submit resold/referred recovery jobs. Project
included tight deadline, with initial release within two weeks, and further development
of additional features over six weeks.
- Laravel Site w/ Payment Checkout: Designed and developed front-end of new
Laravel 5 site, including integrated blog, multiple payment APIs (SagePay, GoCardless,)
and custom invoice PDF generation.
Personal Accomplishments:
- Reduced loading time of existing company websites from 7+ second to sub-3 seconds,
reducing customer drop-oﬀ and improving Google search ranking.
- Assisted senior developer in implementing Agile-methodology (Kanban) of sofware
development across the team.
- Mentored junior developer on both front and back-end development processes and
best practices.

experience.title: Bindary Operator
experience.bio: Bindery operations included cutting, folding, and binding of printed materials. Other duties included cutting and mounting of large format signage, on-site installations, and maintaining and monitoring envelope printers and inserters. Responsibilities include maintaining the workshop floor and monitoring stock levels.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.bio: Update and redesigning the company website. This role included modernisation of the HTML to current web standards, as well as a complete graphical and layout redesign. Challenges included creating a design colour preview app from scratch, and being unable to alter the back-end PHP.

experience.title: Print Room Assistant
experience.bio: Assisting in the day to day running of the screen printing workshop. Primary duties included maintaining, screening and burning silk screens for use in both manual and automatic printing machines. Other duties included maintaining back-room workshop, negative filing, and occasional print-room relief during busy periods.

experience.title: Layout Editor
experience.bio: Creating and maintaining layouts and styling for Bunbury magazine. Managing colour themes and typeface, as well as creating typography, illustrations, and graphical assets as required.
